forsale

Interface Strategy


  • public interface Strategy
    The interface for describing strategies in "For Sale". A strategy must be able to make a bid in an auction (including passing), and must choose a card to play in a sale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int bid(PlayerRecord p, AuctionState a)
      Makes a bid for a player given the state of the current auction.
      Card chooseCard(PlayerRecord p, SaleState s)
      Chooses a card for a player in the current sale.

    • Method Detail

      • bid

        int bid(PlayerRecord p,
        AuctionState a)
        Makes a bid for a player given the state of the current auction. A return value less than the current bid (or more than the player's cash) indicates that the player is dropping out of the auction.
        Parameters:
        p - the player
        a - the state of the auction
        Returns:
        the bid

      • chooseCard

        Card chooseCard(PlayerRecord p,
                SaleState s)
        Chooses a card for a player in the current sale. It is expected that this will be a card whic the player holds! If this contract is violated the game management system can choose any one of the player's cards in an arbitrary manner.
        Parameters:
        p - the player
        s - the state of the current sale
        Returns:
        the card which that player will sell in this sale.
